titles.title: To amend title 37, United States Code, to require a minimum basic pay level of $2,000 per month for members of the Armed Forces serving in a combat zone.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 4/19/2005--Introduced. Requires that, in the case of a member of the Armed Forces who serves on active duty for more than 10 days during any month in an area for which special combat zone pay is authorized, the rate of basic pay for the member for that month shall not be less than $2,000.
